description: Phishing email detected attempting credential harvesting targeting Google account. Email spoofs legitimate Google login page requesting user credentials. Contains malicious links to attacker-controlled domain polarpak.ca and similar domains with high similarity to Google services accounts.google.com.jezbd8kbnibm.com myaccount.google.com.jezbd8kbnibm.com. Victim Doris Moreno Legal Department. Email origin appears to be from spoofed Google address no-reply@accounts.google.com. Multiple suspicious attachments and embedded links detected. This represents a high-risk credential harvesting attack.
email_subject: Verify your Google Account - Immediate Action Required
